```{python}
def greedy(agent, m, i):
    x = agent.location[0]
    y = agent.location[1]
    a = m.cities[i][0]-x
    b = m.cities[i][1]-y
    if abs(a)>abs(b):
        if a>0:
            return (1,0)
        else:
            return (-1,0)
    else:
        if b>0:
            return (0,1)
        else:
            return (0,-1)
```

```{python}
i = 0
j = 0
while 1:
    j+=1
    move = greedy(a,m,i)
    a.update(move)
    m.try_visit(a.location[0],a.location[1],0)
    print(a.location)
    if m.visited[i]:
        print(i,'city checked')
        i+=1
        if all(m.visited):
            print('End',j)
            break
```
